name: Rainy Days
summary: An elderly Japanese man boards a ferry bound for an unknown island. As he looks out over the water, the falling rain triggers a string of memories, including of a childhood experience in Fukuoka and a brief encounter many years later, aboard a smoke-filled seaside train.
info:
• 中文名: 雨日
  • 上映年度: 2014-08-22 (日本)
  • 片长: 08:15
  • 官方网站: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W_aIdp8DIH4
  • 导演: Vladimir Leschiov
